reviewtext: I purchased these headphones for my office PC for listening to voicemails as they were the cheapest headphones I could find on Amazon. For a few bucks, I couldn't care about the sound quality.I just got them today and plugged them into my home computer to test them out.And all I can say is WOW. The bass on these is *incredible*. I'm blown away.These are so good I'm going to keep them at home and buy another pair for the office!Amazing sound, extremely light weight, comfortable, and inexpensive. Can't ask for more.
